package.description: This is a ROS port of the Player camera1394 driver for devices supporting the IEEE 1394 Digital Camera protocol. It is designed to work with the ROS image_pipeline with minimal dependencies, using libdc1394 for device access.
package.author: Patrick Beeson, Nate Koenig, Andrew Howard, Damien Douxchamps, Dan Dennedy, Jack O'Quin
